resources.string: Here is the detailed view of all your data usage. This includes the small stuff like when you are connected to Wifi and when you are using this app which is free

You will soon able to check your data but we need some data on the quality and use of the connectivity services.Turn on the network optimization so that can collect this data and provide you with a better experience.
